reviewText: Great video for those nights that need some good taste -- Wish that the game was better and the free video was better

The women look good and it will keep you entertained for a little while.  The game is stupid and pointless and when you win, the too chicks are not worth watching.  There are 2 scenes with 2 girls in both of them but not hardcore, just a little kiss and touch.  One scene is even used in another DVD I saw which is sad.  But overall the girl on the cover is hot and there are others also so its alright for watching.  Chicks won't dig this DVD unless they are lesbian.
What is so great about this title is that not only are the girls beautiful and the scenes are hot but this DVD is funny as hell. The interactive game is pretty cool too.
